content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. I must say, for a centrally located, newly built, unfurnished 50 square meter one-bedroom apartment, the price should be quite high. Let's negotiate a bit, shall we?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Certainly, Mister Schmidt. I'm open to discussing a fair price. Could you please tell me what you're thinking in terms of the monthly rent?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo, I was thinking of something around 2000 euros a month. I'm sure you'll agree that the location and condition of the apartment justify this price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate the quality of the apartment, Mister Schmidt, but 2000 euros is quite steep. I'm looking for something more in the range of 1500 euros. What do you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm afraid 1500 euros is too low, Yi-Nuo. I could potentially go down to 1800 euros, but I'm sure you'll agree that this is still a fair price for such a prime location and condition.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1800 euros is more reasonable, Mister Schmidt. I'm willing to pay 1750 euros. This would be a fair deal for both parties, in my opinion.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate your offer, Yi-Nuo, but 1750 euros is still too low. I could potentially go down to 1775 euros, but I'm sure you'll agree that this is already a considerable concession on my part.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. 1775 euros is closer to what I'm looking for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and pay 1787.5 euros. This would be a great compromise, don't you think?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Well, Yi-Nuo, I appreciate your attempt to find a middle ground, but I'm afraid 1787.5 euros is still too low. I could potentially go down to 1793 euros, but I'm sure you'll agree that this is already a considerable concession on my part.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Mister Schmidt. 1793 euros is very close to what I'm willing to pay. I'm willing to meet you at 1793 euros. This would be a fair deal for both parties, I believe.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1793 euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Wonderful! I'm glad we could reach an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
